review: Can't say enough about AMAZON FIRE TV.  Fast to connect, ease in use, speed in delivering movies  the selection is amazing  Nothing to say bad about this tiny box of wonders. The voice activation is so simple with immediate results. My wife and I love it.  There are two things I hope to see in the future one is more old Oscar wining movies that are free ( this extra charge was a surprise) though copyrights are the reason. I also would love a good news channel. Then we can rid ourselves of the high cost of satellite or cable. This is really wonderful. The clearest picture we have ever had.  Thank you Amazon.

review: I was under the impression that all TV programs would be veiwablw through Amazon Fire. However, I discovered that quite a lot of the latest showa are either not made available immediately, and are released two ro three weeks later, or when they are available you would have to pay to watch them. Time Warner Cable already had most of these on demand programs available for free. Just be aware that you can't replace your cable company by having Amazon Fire.

review: I'm blown away amazon would release this device without full functioning amazon mp3.  I have 3 rokus.  i purchased fire tv assuming I would be able to enjoy prime music I couldn't access on roku.  Wrong!  Fail amazon.  What have you become?  You expect me to want a fire phone after this?  Should i assume that device will also not give me access to prime amazon music?  Don't make your customer suffer by releasing crap just because your developers didn't hit their targets.  Not difficult to understand.  The device has your name on it.  Shouldn't it provide full blown access to your content?  I can stream prime music from my idevice for god's sake.
